bibl.title: Notes on Sappho and Alcaeus.
bibl.note: A few of the ideas expressed in this article were briefly mentioned in a review of the work of E.-M. VOIGT, CR N.S., 27 (1977) pp. 161-163. - S. 99 L.-P. i 4 ff.; 132; 211. - A. 6.12-14; 45.1-2; 119.1; 130 b.9-11; 167 and 169; 186.3-7; 269b.1; 306A b 24 ff; 309; 334; 356; 359; 367.1; 401B a; 424A Campbell. - Lesb. inc. 5c; 12.
